column4: I made an error, I know when doing a dual boot you should always install windows first then linux or else windows will over write the bootloader and you won't be able to boot Ubuntu, I had to reinstall windows because that's how windows is needs to be reinstalled so often but I had a whole bunch of stuff on Ub untu and don't want to lose itr. how do I install a bootloader now?
search for recover Grub at https://wiki.ubuntu.com --> https://wiki.ubuntu.com/RecoveringUbuntuAfterInstallingWindows?action=show&redirect=RecoveringGrub
